Hero.structure: Split layout. Left: 3D Typography (Playfair) with 'OSI CONFERENCE 2026'. Right: Abstract Blue Glass 3D visual.
Hero.animation: Text stagger reveal using Framer Motion. Parallax on background image.

Navbar.style: Fixed, Glassmorphism. Logo left, Links center, 'Register' Gold Button right.
Navbar.behavior: Hide on scroll down, show on scroll up (smart nav).

Speakers.layout: Bento Grid. Mix of large feature cards (Keynote) and smaller standard cards.
Speakers.card_style: Minimalist white cards with grayscale photos that turn color on hover.

Registration.style: Pricing Table with 'Tracing Beam' effect. Gold beam moving around the 'Early Bird' card.

About.style: Asymmetric layout. Text block overlapping a large clinical image.

Venue.style: Full width image with overlay card for address/map.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Stethoscope, Calendar, MapPin, User, ArrowRight)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install framer-motion lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
2. SETUP FONTS: Add Playfair Display and Manrope via Google Fonts in index.css
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
4. ANIMATION: Implement Lenis smooth scrolling in App.js immediately.
5. MOCKING: Mock the Razorpay payment flow. Do not try to implement real payments.
6. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure Gold text (#D4AF37) is only used on Dark backgrounds (#002366). On white backgrounds, use a darker gold (#8A7018) or standard text color.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs (e.g., 'register-btn', 'contact-email').

universal_guidelines.theme: Light Mode base, but with heavy 'Royal Blue' sections (Hero, Footer).
universal_guidelines.button_style: Pill-shaped or slightly rounded (rounded-lg). Primary button: Royal Blue bg + Gold text or Gold bg + Royal Blue text.
universal_guidelines.glass_effect: Use backdrop-blur-md for overlays, but keep text legible.
